name: Source Data Destruction_Plan
description:
Game Name:Source Data Destruction Plan(SDD Plan)

In the game, you will act as a virus, constantly invade the computer by arranging connection nodes, and fight with anti-virus software until the invasion is completed.

1. Consider the order of nodelinks;

2. Sanxiao will promote the progress of infection;

3. Anti virtus will repair nodes every round;

4. Fixed nodes can be destroyed by triple towns;

5. Automatic rotation of antivirtus software in triple Town station;

6. Level5 nodes are special

Production：MetaAction_J(programmer) & YUZITIAN(artist)
